snippet.title: Smart Technology 2 OFFICIAL TRAILER
snippet.description:
I was wanting to continue Agatha's story, and found an excuse to do so!

DOWNLOAD ON ITCH.IO: https://sciaenops.itch.io/smart-technology-2

ORIGINAL DESCRIPTION:
"It's the Christmas season.  You have returned to Agatha's realm.  You believe you've recovered from all the trauma of your first stay there.  Things suddenly spiral out of control when Agatha is hit with a strange frequency and considers you an intruder all over again.  You have to survive one more evening against Agatha while trying to return her to normal and decipher why she changed.  Things may never be the same.

Return home.

Agatha is being watched.

    • A short game about a hacked smart house
    • More specifically, a science fiction/horror choose-your-own-adventure
    • Sequel to Smart Technology, ranked 2nd for Best Story in Scream jam 2020!
    • Vintage look meant to emulate 50’s horror movies in a modern setting
    • New rooms, plot twists, and puzzles!
    • Quality-of-life improvements to provide a smoother replay experience!
    • Multiple grisly and gruesome endings
    • There's a cat.  You can pet it.
    • Featuring photography from Unsplash.com, sound effects by Zapsplat.com, and music by Alexander Nakarada

CONTENT WARNING: There are multiple endings that can end in your demise.  While no blood or gore is shown on-screen, it is described in some detail.  The game is only as violent as your mind makes it. "
